name: Wizjammers
description:
Made in Global Game Jam 2016 (48h) with the theme "Ritual"

"This is a game about two enemy wizards, that try to perform an ancient and arcane ritual. They need to collect all the necessary ingredients for their magical rite, in order to invoke The Dark Lord. The first one who succeeds, will be the winner of this magical challenge! Look for a player, choose your wizard and try to beat your enemy!"

Be the first to take the ingredients of your recipe to your magical base! Take advantage of your special habilities!

Credits:

Daniel Matas (@Eldan_Knight) & Julia Afán (@YulsAfan): graphics

Carlos Viola: music and sound effects

Sergio de Prado (@sergiodeprado) & Jorge Pedraza (@Deebrol): code and scene composition

Place: Córdoba (Spain) @gamejamodb
